Played it for more than 5 years and lately I started to get very disappointed. Almost everyday players that I had reported got banned and who knows how many of those that were cheating didn't. Every time I tried to play Competitive or any other Ranking Match there was always that guy with Level 0 Steam and Rank 1 on CS:GO that was either a cheater or a CS:GO Master with just 100 hours of play. At one point I got so frustrated I threw my phone to the wall breaking it to pieces. That's when I realized what this game had done to me, so I uninstalled it right after never to install it again. If you're looking for a fair game look elsewhere, because this is the opposite of that !
Esse jogo é bom demais, o que quebra é quem joga, muita gente tóxica/troll. Jogando em time fechado esse jogo é o melhor.
